decisions.description: Distributes off of the "HS Intake Vendor" field. This is auto assigned in HubSpot workflows when a form is filled.

decisions.label: CPL - Intake Vendor Distro

decisions.description: Distributes off of the "HS Intake Vendor" field. This is auto assigned in HubSpot workflows when a form is filled.

Flow.description:
6/26 - Updating to add CPL sold checkbox to those who are CPL vendor intakes with no previous intake for the vendor, or not within 30 days of a previous intake of any vendor.
"If 'Create Intake Trigger' is True and 'HubSpot Campaign Name' is 'Round Up', initiate an Intake. This occurs after a form submission, when HubSpot creates or updates the Party record and syncs it to Salesforce."

formulas.description: Finds if the most recent intake associated with a Party and if it is within 30 days or not.
formulas.name: Most_Recent_Intake_30_Days

Flow.label: HubSpot Form | Roundup | Create Intake

recordUpdates.description: Unchecks the field "Create Intake Trigger" on the triggering party to reset the intake creation process if a new intake needs to be created in the future for the same party.
recordUpdates.name: Update_Create_Intake_Trigger
recordUpdates.label: Update "Create Intake Trigger", "HS Sold - CPL", and "HS Test Intake" on Party
